page.title: 05Rev. Mansfield. Vicar.
page.content: We asked{Rev. Mansfield}how he spends his time. On Sundays he has Church Services.In Steeple Bumpstead, there is Family Service at 11am.In Helions Bumpstead,there is{Family Service}once a month at 9am.Sunday school starts at 10am but there is no Sunday school in August.The vicar goes round seeing people when they are sad or lonely or people who have just come out of hospital with new babies, and people who have just moved in.He also comes into school on Mondays to do our Assembly.The vicar has had 6 weddings so far this year.He lives in the New Vicarage on Church Street. Opposite, is the{Old Vicarage,}where{Edith {Cavell}was a Nursery Governess for 5 years. There is a tablet to her memory in the church, and a street in the village is called Edith Cavell Way.
